item.title: 五角大楼向 xAI 和 OpenAI 授予高达 2 亿美元的合同
item.description: 美国四家顶尖的人工智能开发商赢得了国防部的合同，旨在加快军方对这一新兴技术的采用。【原文：Four of the top US artificial intelligence developers won contracts from the Defense Department aimed at accelerating the military’s adoption of the emerging technology.】

item.title: 特朗普将公布 700 亿美元的人工智能和能源投资计划
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周二在宾夕法尼亚州宣布 700 亿美元的人工智能和能源投资，这是白宫为加快新兴技术发展所做的最新努力。【原文：President Donald Trump will announce $70 billion in artificial intelligence and energy investments in Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the latest push from the White House to speed up development of the emerging technology.】

item.title: 全球最大主权基金买入评级被下调的哥伦比亚债务
item.description: 世界顶级主权财富基金是 6 月份哥伦比亚地方债券的主要买家，而在 6 月份，该国受到了两次信用评级下调以及暂停财政支出限制的影响。【原文：The world’s top sovereign wealth fund was a major buyer of Colombian local bonds in June, the month the country got hit by two credit downgrades and fallout from a suspension of fiscal spending limits.】

item.title: 华盛顿特立独行赌场重组后申请破产
item.description: 位于华盛顿的赌场和棋牌室运营商 Maverick Gaming 在去年进行债务重组后，于本周一申请破产。【原文：Maverick Gaming, a Washington-based casino and card-room operator, filed for bankruptcy on Monday following a debt restructuring last year.】

item.description: 阿尔蒙蒂工业公司（Almonty Industries Inc.【原文：Almonty Industries Inc. shares rose about 7% in their US trading debut after the tungsten miner raised $90 million in an oversubscribed offering to list on Nasdaq.】

item.title: 鲍威尔要求美联储监察长审查翻新项目
item.description: 据监察长办公室发言人称，美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔已正式要求央行监察长审查其耗资 25 亿美元的大楼翻新工程。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has made a formal request that the central bank’s inspector general review its $2.5 billion building renovation, according to a spokesperson for the IG’s office.】

item.title: 在 Grok 聊天机器人发布反犹太帖子后，欧盟召集 X 进行会谈
item.description: 欧盟官员将与埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司代表举行会谈，因为该公司的 Grok 聊天机器人上周在平台上发布了反犹太主义帖子，引起了众怒。【原文：Officials from the European Union will hold talks with representatives from Elon Musk’s X after the company’s Grok chatbot caused outrage by spewing antisemitic posts on the platform last week.】

item.title: 欧洲风险投资公司有望迎来十年来筹资额最低的一年
item.description: 欧洲风险投资支持的公司将迎来自2015年以来最糟糕的一年，因为投资者避免将资金投入这个回报艰难的行业。【原文：Venture capital-backed firms in Europe are on track for their worst year of fundraising since 2015, as investors avoid putting money in an industry that’s struggled with returns.】

item.title: 美国法官将阿根廷 YPF 公司的移交期限延长三天
item.description: 纽约联邦法官要求阿根廷在周一之前将其在 YPF SA 的控股权让给 160 亿美元判决的持有人，该法官允许南美国家延期三天，以便向上诉法院申请更长的延期。【原文：The New York federal judge who gave Argentina until Monday to cede its controlling stake in YPF SA to holders of a $16 billion judgment granted the South American nation a three-day extension to seek a longer delay from an appeals court.】

item.title: 西班牙承诺向加泰罗尼亚地区政府移交税收权力
item.description: 西班牙正朝着将加泰罗尼亚地区的税收收入移交给地区政府这一具有政治争议的方向迈出重要一步。【原文：Spain is taking a major step towards a politically controversial handover of tax-income collection in Catalonia to the regional government.】

item.title: 扎克伯格称 Meta 将建造数个千兆瓦级数据中心
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）表示，公司正在建设几个大型数据中心，为其人工智能工作提供动力，预计第一个数据中心将于明年投入使用。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg said the company is building several massive data centers to power its artificial intelligence efforts with the first one expected to come online next year.】

item.title: 尼日利亚股市创历史新高，创 2024 年 3 月以来最长涨势
item.description: 在西非国家经济前景改善的支撑下，尼日利亚股市连续第九个交易日上涨，创下历史新高。【原文：Nigerian stocks advanced to a record high as the bourse notched a ninth straight day of gains backed by an improving economic outlook for the West African nation.】

item.title: 暴雨即将来临，得克萨斯州和纽约州再次面临洪水威胁
item.description: 得克萨斯州中部正面临着更多洪水的威胁，因为持续的风暴给该地区带来了暴雨，而另一个系统将给纽约市和整个中大西洋地区带来倾盆大雨。【原文：Central Texas is facing the threat of more flooding as persistent storms bring heavy rain to the area, while a separate system will unleash downpours on New York City and throughout the Mid-Atlantic.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯对 Neom 称为 "线 "的巨型城市进行评论
item.description: 据几位熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯已要求咨询公司对其建设一个被称为 "The Line "的未来城市的宏伟计划进行战略审查，因为沙特正在评估其项目相关支出的优先次序。【原文：Saudi Arabia has asked consulting firms to conduct a strategic review of its ambitious plans for building a futuristic city known as The Line, according to several people familiar with the matter, as the kingdom assesses priorities for its project-related expenditures.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索不太可能成为特朗普贸易战的赢家
item.description: 即使在唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的情况下，投资者押注墨西哥货币也获得了回报。【原文：Betting on Mexico’s currency has paid off for investors even amid Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 麦凯称：几十年来债券价值最高的是股票
item.description: 根据 MacKay Municipal Managers 的一份新报告，与股票相比，免税市政债券具有引人注目的价值。【原文：Tax-exempt municipal bonds are offering compelling value compared to equities, according to a new report by MacKay Municipal Managers.】

item.title: 赛勒战略的比特币持有量增至 700 多亿美元
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒战略公司（Michael Saylor's Strategy）持有的比特币总价值已超过 730 亿美元，因为这家加密货币金库公司在比特币价格创下历史新高时恢复了对数字资产的购买。【原文：The total value of Bitcoin held by Michael Saylor’s Strategy has surpassed $73 billion as the cryptocurrency treasury company resumed purchases of the digital asset with prices at an all-time high.】

item.title: 报告称德国商业地产面临进一步下滑的风险
item.description: 德国政府领导的一个委员会发布的一份定期报告称，由于向网上购物和家庭办公的转变以及更严格的能源要求等结构性变化，德国商业地产价格面临进一步下跌的风险。【原文：German commercial property prices are at risk of further declines as structural changes such as the shift to online shopping and home office as well as stricter energy requirements weigh on the sector, according to a regular report from a government-led commission.】

item.title: 随着印度市场日趋成熟，淡马锡将更大胆、更有选择性地投资印度市场
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）正寻求在数量较少的印度公司身上下更大的赌注，以提高其价值 500 亿美元的本地投资组合的回报率。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte is looking to place bigger bets on fewer Indian companies to boost returns on its $50 billion local portfolio in a rapidly growing market where exiting investments has become easier.】

item.title: 土耳其官员力促允许企业重组贷款
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）政府的一位高级官员表示，土耳其企业在长期的高借贷成本下举步维艰，他还补充说，他正在倡导一项促进贷款重组的提案。【原文：Turkish companies are struggling under a prolonged period of high borrowing costs, a senior official from President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s government said, adding he’s championing a proposal to facilitate loan restructuring.】

item.title: 关税影响有望终结美国通胀读数连续向好趋势
item.description: 经济学家长期以来一直警告说，关税将推动美国通胀。下一份消费者物价报告将对他们的信念进行检验。【原文：Economists have long been warning of a tariff-driven boost to US inflation. The next report on consumer prices will put their conviction to the test.】

item.title: 部长称俄罗斯到 2030 年将面临 1100 万劳动力短缺
item.description: 俄罗斯劳工部长安东-科季亚科夫（Anton Kotyakov）在周一的一次会议上告诉总统弗拉基米尔-普京，俄罗斯需要在未来五年内每年找到相当于 200 万名工人的职位，以填补即将退休人员留下的空缺。【原文：Russia needs to find the equivalent of 2 million workers a year over the next five years to fill vacancies left by people who are due to retire, Labor Minister Anton Kotyakov told President Vladimir Putin at a meeting on Monday.】

item.title: Dye & 达勒姆公司前首席执行官敦促 Engine Capital 创始人退出董事会
item.description: Dye & Durham Ltd.的一名大股东向两名董事施加了更大的辞职压力，声称这家加拿大科技公司在内部控制和治理方面存在失误。【原文：A major shareholder of Dye & Durham Ltd. ramped up the pressure on two directors to resign, alleging the Canadian technology company has failures in its internal controls and governance practices.】

item.title: 期权预示关税动荡将引发更多盈利季节波动
item.description: 关税的影响迫在眉睫，这将是连续第二个财报季成为焦点，促使投资者为更大的波动做好准备。【原文：The looming impacts of tariffs will be in focus for a second-straight earnings season, prompting investors to position for more volatility.】

item.title: 特朗普加强关税威胁，美国股市从历史高位回落
item.description: 美国股市周一扩大跌幅，从历史记录进一步下跌，原因是唐纳德-特朗普总统对欧洲和墨西哥发出的最新一轮关税威胁，使投资者在本周企业财报季启动之际保持紧张。【原文：US stocks extended declines Monday to fall further from records, as President Donald Trump’s latest salvo of tariff threats for Europe and Mexico kept investors on edge as corporate earnings season kicks off this week.】

item.title: 英国电网运营商上调电力需求增长预测
item.description: 据国家能源系统运营商称，由于人口增长率提高和经济电气化，英国电力需求的增幅将超过此前的预测。【原文：UK power demand is set to increase by more than previously forecast due to higher population growth rates and the electrification of the economy, according to the National Energy System Operator.】

item.title: 印度在收到报告后下令检查波音喷气机的燃油开关
item.description: 上个月，印度航空公司一架 787 客机因煤油供应中断而坠毁，印度民航局在收到有关该事故的初步报告后，已下令对在印度运营的波音公司 737 和 787 客机的驾驶舱燃料开关进行检查。【原文：India’s civil aviation authority has ordered an inspection of cockpit fuel switches on Boeing Co. 737 and 787 aircraft operating in the country following a preliminary report into the deadly crash of an Air India 787 last month that was caused by a cut-off in kerosene supply.】

item.title: 拉吉夫-詹恩（Rajiv Jain）的 GQG 推出首只 ETF，主动型基金竞争加剧
item.description: GQG Partners —；这家由资深投资者拉吉夫-贾恩（Rajiv Jain）于 2016 年联合创办的资产管理公司资产规模达 1,720 亿美元—；正在向 11 万亿美元 ETF 行业中竞争最激烈的一角发起冲击。【原文：GQG Partners — the $172 billion asset manager co-founded by veteran investor Rajiv Jain in 2016 — is launching into one of the most competitive corners of the $11 trillion ETF industry.】
